section.p:
Cross off the 75 Shards. You hand the Soulwatch the cash. Their black masks, shaped like the Usskhem, the avenging demons of Ebron, nod imperceptibly. One of them hands you a
.
'See that you do not blaspheme again, or you will join the heretics in hell,' whispers one of the black-garbed fanatics. They glide away.
